participant_1.background:
I love the way my nursery looks with my green crib and crib mobile.
I grow my own vegetables and cook them myself.
my parents are divorced.
I'm more concerned with my health and the health of my children.
I'm grateful to my parents for helping me out financially.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy trying new ethnic foods with my friends from out of town.
I spent my last year learning about art and history so that I can be a better museum curator.
I love to spend time with my cat, especially when I'm feeling stressed from school.
my credit cards are maxed out.
My new job in the medical field is much more fulfilling than my old job as a tour guide.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
Hey, I'm doing great! How are you?
I'm good thanks! I just finished painting my baby's nursery, so I'm feeling happy and productive.
That's so awesome! I love painting. What color did you choose?
I went with a light green color because I think it's calming and soothing.
That sounds beautiful! I'm sure your baby will love it.
Thanks, I hope so! I'm also growing my own vegetables in my garden, so I'm excited to see how they turn out.
That's awesome! I love gardening, but I don't have a lot of space for it.
I'm lucky to have a big yard, so I can grow a lot of different things.
What kind of vegetables are you growing?
I'm growing tomatoes, peppers, cucumbers, and zucchini.
Those are all my favorites! I'm sure they'll taste delicious.
I hope so! I'm also grateful to my parents for helping me out financially.
That's great! I'm sure they're happy to help.
Yeah, they are. I'm really lucky to have them.
It sounds like you have a lot to be grateful for!
I do! I'm really happy with my life right now
